allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add register page and fix bcrypt/email-validator compatibility

- Add RegisterForm component and /register page
- Replace passlib with direct bcrypt usage to fix bcrypt 4.x incompatibility
- Add email-validator dependency for pydantic EmailStr support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
